# Environment Variables for Local Development
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values

# Flask Configuration
SECRET_KEY=your-dev-secret-key-change-in-production

# Google OAuth (for local development)
# Get these from: https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=your_google_client_id_here
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=your_google_client_secret_here
# For local development, this will be auto-generated as http://localhost:5000/auth/callback/google

# Discord OAuth (for local development)
# Get these from: https://discord.com/developers/applications
DISCORD_CLIENT_ID=your_discord_client_id_here
DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET=your_discord_client_secret_here
# For local development, this will be auto-generated as http://localhost:5000/auth/callback/discord

# Database (optional - will use SQLite by default)
# DATABASE_URL=sqlite:///instance/portfolio_auth.db

# Production OAuth Redirect URIs (only needed for production)
# GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI=https://oo-analytics.azurewebsites.net/auth/callback/google
# DISCORD_REDIRECT_URI=https://oo-analytics.azurewebsites.net/auth/callback/discord
